product_name: The North Face Decagon Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: Stay dry and comfortable in the Decagon jacket from The North Face, which boasts windproof, waterproof and breathable protection in a heritage-inspired design and roomy, park-style fit. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Stretch powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Hood is fully adjustable for a customized fit with unobstructed vision. Zippered underarm vents let you control airflow to keep you comfortable. Adjustable hem and rip-and-stick cuffs dial in the fit and retain valuable warmth. Dual-entry flap and zip hand pockets; zip chest pocket with media pocket access; internal goggles pocket. The North Face Decagon jacket has a relaxed fit with a roomy body and sleeves.
short_description: Stay dry and comfortable in the Decagon jacket from The North Face, which boasts windproof, waterproof and breathable protection in a heritage-inspired design and roomy, park-style fit.
